titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Booth family papers

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

archdesc.bioghist: Family of Horace Booth of Lodi, Mich., and his son Nelson Booth, onetime owner of the Ticknor farm in Pittsfield Township, Mich.
archdesc.scopecontent: Genealogical information, clippings, letters, and miscellanea of the Booth and related families.
